name: Keep 'Em Alive
description:
You are a Nurse. All your patients are dying because the whole city's is power shut down... Oh and also there is a zombie crisis.

Controls

Arrow keys to move around.

Hold down space key and a direction to aim.

Release space key to shoot.

How To Play

You have to keep as many patients as possible alive until the time reaches 0.

Patients constantly lose health.

You can stabilize a patient's health manually.

Powering up a room will heal a patient but also drain power.

Zombies will try to murder your patients but you have a shotgun.

The shotgun has 2 shots in it. You have to get ammo when it is empty.

You can kill zombies with your shotgun and use their corpses to gain power using the generator

Team

*Erdal Ural -- Programming, Game Design

*İdil Kıtır -- Artwork

*Umur Cem Altürk -- Programming, Sound Design

*Onur Koralp -- Writing, Game Design
